song.title: Capsaicin Blues
song.info:
000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 /\ /\ \/ 0000 0000 \/ /\ 0 0 0 /\ \/ 0 0000 \/ /\ 0 0 0 /\ \/ 0000 A P S A I C I N 0000 L U E S \/ /\ /\ 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
<<>>---------------<<>>
-=SONG FACTS=- Tracked/composed by Pip Malt and Jakim in 2010.
-=SAMPLES=- *----Sample 4 from Arachno. *----Sample 5 from Reed. *----Sample 6 by Pip Malt. *----I'm not sure where the rest came from. *----Jakim isn't too :).
<<>>---------------<<>>
-=COMMENTS=- Pip Malt: My first co-op! I've always admired Jakim's writing style, so he was my first choice. Most of the leads you hear are Jakim's; I did more of the "rhythm" stuff. I like how this one turned out. I hope to do more!
Jakim: I felt kinda strange when I had to change style of this module to something different. That was a desecration of previous mood. But it has turned to something new, maybe even unexpected. Ah, there is Something Else. Pip Malt's ending is so lovely :).
<<>>---------------<<>>
